name: Para Ark
description:
A space advanture rpg hentai game.

What will you experience in this game?
1. Breed your monster girl
2. Main character body will progressively grow in size (10+ transformations)
3. Three point pregnancy (Normal, breast, futa)
4. 30+ Characters with variate standing image
5. Upgrade your spaceship to win space battle
6. Explore planets and collect resource
7. Craft equipment to adapt different hazardous environment
8. All creatures will give you a hug

Demo contains 70 - 80% of the game.
